overview: Generaci贸n Anti Todo establishes a dialogue between the generations raised in the 1980s and those that have done so in the 2000s, with the Basque punk group Eskorbuto as the connecting link. Generaci贸n Anti Todo departs from the usual documentary format to explore new questions from new perspectives: just as we idealize the memory of the dead, has Eskorbuto been mythologized? Has it become a capitalist product? What about the phenomenon in Latin America? Is punk dead?
title: Generaci贸n Anti Todo
